CUSIBOX: TOASTER **2 SLICE**

(7) Browning Control:

7 Shade Settings for Perfect Toasting. High-quality heating elements toast evenly on both sides. Enjoy a delicious toasted breakfast that adds a crispy, tasty start to your mornings

Multiple Toasting Mode with LED Indicators:

Defrost for toasting frozen breads; Reheat for reheat toast / bread without over-browning or burning it; Cancel for stopping all toast task

Removable Crumb Tray & Cord Wrap:

The crumb tray is easily to slides out which make cleaning easily and the cord wrap storage is right for your counter space
